comment: * A utility class encapsulating a compressed ETC1 texture.

methods.name: public int getWidth()
methods.comment:
* Get the width of the texture in pixels.
         * @return the width of the texture in pixels.

methods.name: public int getHeight()
methods.comment:
* Get the height of the texture in pixels.
         * @return the width of the texture in pixels.

methods.name: public ByteBuffer getData()
methods.comment:
* Get the compressed data of the texture.
         * @return the texture data.
